# Packages Reports

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/packages-reports/

## Category
06 Gift Cards And Packages

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
REPORTS
Packages Reports
IN THIS ARTICLE
Package Usage Report
Outstanding Packages Report
Package Sales Report
Package Sales Details Report

If the Packages app is enabled for your account, the following Packages reports are available in the Reports app.

Packages reports can help you track package usage, outstanding package credits, and more.

Link copied
Package Usage Report

The Package Usage report includes package usage details.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Package Usage report.

Column

	

Description




Date

	

The date the package was used.




Sale #

	

The sale where the package was used.




Client

	

The client who used the package.




Package

	

The name of the package.




Service

	

The service for which the package was used.




Value

	

The value of the applied package.

Link copied
Outstanding Packages Report

The Outstanding Packages report includes outstanding package credits as of today.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Outstanding Packages report.

Column

	

Description




Package

	

The name of the package.




Purchase Date

	

The date the package was purchased.




Client

	

The client who purchased the package.




Email

	

The client’s email address.




Phone

	

The client’s phone number.




Remaining

	

The number of remaining services in the package.




Amount

	

The value of the remaining services in the package.

Link copied
Package Sales Report

The Package Sales report includes quantities and sales totals of packages.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Package Sales report.

Column

	

Description




Name

	

The name of the package.




# Packages

	

The number of packages sold.




Adjustments

	

The adjustments that were made to the default price during checkout.




Taxes

	

The amount of tax that was collected.




Sales

	

The package sales total.

Link copied
Package Sales Details Report

The Package Sales Details report includes details for each package sale. Download the Excel report to see client emails.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Package Sales Details report.

Column

	

Description




Sale #

	

The sale where the package was sold.




Sale Date

	

The date of the sale where the package was sold.




Client

	

The client who purchased the package.




Package Name

	

The name of the package.




Price

	

The price of the package.




Sold By Staff

	

The staff member who sold the package.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
